#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        int x=1,y=1;
        n--;
        while(n--)
        {
            x=(x+y)%m;
            y=(x+y)%m;
            
        }
        x%=m;
        y%=m;
        cout<<x<<"/"<<y<<endl;
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
